Nature: I hereby declare that I have purchased the 1st book,
Document No. 1, from the office of the Registrar, Nellore, on 21-12-2024, from Senji Mohan Sundaram,
2. Thiruvallur Nalini Garla. 33236/2024, the property as per the schedule below, which I have full rights and is in my possession, by virtue of the sale deed registered in my name as per the following schedule, which I wish to sell today for my needs and you wish to purchase, I hereby consent and sell it to you of my own free will for a sum of Rs. 18, 20,000/- in words, that is, eighteen lakhs and twenty thousand rupees. The sale proceeds include Rs. 17,00,000/- paid in installments and Rs. 1,20,000/- paid in cash today, the remaining sale proceeds being Rs. 18, 20,000/- in letters, eighteen lakhs and twenty thousand rupees, so I have fully paid it. I have sold the property as per the schedule and taken possession of it today. From now on, you shall pay the corporation taxes, etc. payable on the said property and you shall enjoy the said property, its available funds, deposits, water, land, watercourses, eight luxuries, and the right to donate, sell and exchange it, with full rights and you and your heirs shall enjoy it to the fullest extent of the law. From now on, neither I, nor my heirs nor anyone else shall have any right whatsoever in the said property. I, my heirs, and all my other property, shall be liable for all damages and losses that may arise from any dispute or dispute arising out of or in connection with this sale property, and I hereby transfer the property to you and your heirs as per the schedule. There are no charges on the said property. There are no other rights holders other than me in the property as per the schedule below. This is a written deed of sale of immovable property given with my consent. SalilSheet Endorsement

Note: This property is not owned by the Government as per Act 9/77 and no mortgages have been placed on it either by the Government or by any other person.
Declaration
I/We hereby declare that I/We have duly stated in the said document the full facts relating to the levy of stamp duty, the consideration, the value of the property and the stamp duty payable on the said document, and that in case I/We fail to act as mentioned in section 27 above, the Government may recover from me/us the said amount by levying penalty and stamp duty as per sections 64, 64(a) and may prosecute me/us under section 70. In accordance with Section 21 of the Indian Registration Act, 1908, I have included in the deed all the necessary particulars, boundaries, etc. for the identification of the property.
Declaration
This declaration is to inform that at the time of preparation of this deed, all the necessary documents such as the details of the property, copies of 1-B of the land title deeds, link deeds, tax receipts for the lands and houses, details of the parties in the link deed, addresses of the parties, photographs of the parties, details of the property etc. have been obtained and prepared by me. No matter that should have been written or included in this deed has been omitted. The Scheduled Property was physically inspected and measured and the deed was signed. We are fully responsible for the depreciation stamp and all other matters found in the future during the inspection of the property by the authorities (Registration and Stamps and Revenue Department) and we have no connection with the Sub-Registrar Warki or the deed writer. We are fully responsible for all such matters if it is found in the future that the property sold is not assigned to the Government Endowment Wharf Board and we are fully responsible for all such matters. This is a declaration that we have read/read this document completely and have given our full consent. Written by: Sakil Written by: 2 Aartil Sk. Calida.回

sections.content: The property covered under Sale Deed No. 10684 of 2025, dated 01/Dec/2025, executed by Syed Sabiha Banu in favour of Shaik Aakhil & Shaik Nahida, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 140 Sq. Yds., (or) 1260 Sq. Ft., bearing house number 26-2-2793, Plot No. 55, comprised in survey number 5/1, situated in Gandhi Nagar Interior Mahathma Gandhi Nagar Area, Vedayapalem Village, Nellore Municipal Corporation, within the District of SPSR Nellore, registered at sub-registrar office Nellore(R.O)(917) is bounded as follows: North by: Site of Pallipati Rajamma South by: Lay-out Road East by: House of Muthyala Manjula West by: 10 ankanams 20 sq ft site in plot no. 56 of Senji Lalitha

(A) As per Registered Documents: 1. The property in survey number 5/1, Plot No. 55, bearing house no. 26-2-2793, situated in Vedayapalem Village, measuring about 140 Sq. Yds., (or) 1260 Sq. Ft., was originally owned by Tiruvalluru Nalini & Senji Mohan Sundaram, who acquired the property through Doc. No. 8680 of 2012.[Ref : EC] 2. The aforementioned Tiruvalluru Nalini & Senji Mohan Sundaram, executed a Sale Deed on 21-Dec-2024, registered as Doc. No. 33236 of 2024, before the SRO Nellore(R.O)(91 7), in favour of Syed Sabiha Banu, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 140 Sq. Yds., (or) 1260 Sq. Ft., bearing house number 26-2-2793, Plot No. 55, comprised in survey number 5/1, situated in Vedayapalem Village.[Ref : Deed & EC] 3. The aforementioned Syed Sabiha Banu ,executed a Sale Deed on 01-Dec-2025, registered as Doc. No. 10684 of 2025, before the SRO Nellore(R.O)(91 7), in favour of Shaik Aakhil and Shaik Nahida, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 140 Sq. Yds., (or) 1260 Sq. Ft., bearing house number 26-2-2793, Plot No. 55, comprised in survey number 5/1, situated in Vedayapalem Village. Note: The pledging document was registered on 01-Dec-2025, which is less than three months. Hence, F.I. is to obtain internal approval from appropriate authority before disbursement of the loan. (B) Additional Documents Supporting the Title : Note: It is observed that the schedule property is vacant land, whereas, F.I. stated that the property is Vacant land. Hence, HTR is not insisted upon.
The mutation proceedings were not concluded in the name of the current owner Shaik Aakhil & Shaik Nahida.

sections.content:
We have reviewed the documents provided to us as per the F.I. policy and have concluded that the Shaik Aakhil & Shaik Nahida, possesses a clear, valid, and marketable title to the property measuring 140 Sq. Yds., (or) 1260 Sq. Ft., bearing house number 26-2-2793, Plot No. 55, comprised in survey number 5/1, situated in Gandhi Nagar Interior Mahathma Gandhi Nagar Area, Vedayapalem Village, Nellore Municipal Corporation, within the District of SPSR Nellore, registered at sub-registrar office Nellore(R.O)(917). 

Further, the current owner, Shaik Nahida & Shaik Aakhil, is to be added as a party to the loan structure along with the applicant Shaik Aakhil.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible
